title: kandan pEr tanai
sahitya:
kandan pEr tanai vindai idennna solvEn (nAn)  kanivAi amudai parugi kalai shOdanaiyil urigiya


anupallavi

  inda vaibhOgam mundiyum nAn kaNDadilaiyE irukkidupOl ini idai vArumO nalamEviya


caraNam    pangayamAga tangum mayUragiri senrAl bAlakavi hrdayAlayamEgumudanmEl 
pankajamidu naDangaLaiyum puriveidadum arivEn ini mayilin mIdil muraiyAl varum
